entries.journal_entry_description: Boba Fett has employed you. It's usually a good idea to do what he suggests. People that don't play their cards right against Fett has a habit of catching a case of death.
entries.journal_entry_title: Working for Boba Fett, phase IV
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Head to the back of the tavern in the mining outpost and collect the datapad the scientist left there.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The datapad tells of how none of the scientists working on the project know where the specimen came from or what species he was. It also describes how a criminal organization called "The Claw" attacked the lab and 'stole' Durge. Return the datapad to Fett.
